SELECT F_BOARD_NO , F_BOARD_TITLE , F_BOARD_WRITER , TO_CHAR(F_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "F_CREATE_DATE" , F_COUNT , mem_name , BOARD_DIVISION FROM FREE_BOARD JOIN EMPLOYEE ON (F_BOARD_WRITER = MEM_NO) WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CASE WHEN BOARD_DIVISION IN ('N') THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, F_BOARD_NO DESC
mapper.insert: insert into FREE_BOARD ( F_BOARD_NO, F_BOARD_TITLE, F_CREATE_DATE, F_COUNT, F_BOARD_WRITER, F_BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_DIVISION, STATUS, F_DISCLOSURE, F_ALLOWED, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME ) values ( seq_fbno.nextval, #{fBoardTitle}, default, 0, #{fBoardWriter}, #{fBoardContent}, #{boardDivision}, default, default, #{fAllowed}, #{originName}, #{changeName} )
mapper.update: UPDATE FREE_BOARD SET F_COUNT = F_COUNT + 1 WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND F_BOARD_NO = #{fbno}
mapper.select: SELECT F_BOARD_NO , F_BOARD_TITLE , F_BOARD_WRITER , TO_CHAR(F_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "F_CREATE_DATE" , F_BOARD_CONTENT , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , mem_name FROM FREE_BOARD JOIN EMPLOYEE ON (F_BOARD_WRITER = MEM_NO) WHERE F_BOARD_NO = #{fbno}
